message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $11,500 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand it's a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
